query.sql: SELECT SUM(1) total_num, ifnull(l.grade,'未审批') grade FROM job_lines l WHERE l.status != 'NEW' and l.header_id = ${@header_id} GROUP BY l.grade UNION SELECT (COUNT(1) - (SELECT count(1) FROM job_lines l WHERE l.status != 'NEW' and l.header_id = h.header_id ) ) total_num, '未提交' grade FROM fnd_student s, job_headers h WHERE s.class_id = h.class_id AND h.header_id = ${@header_id}
